thread.section_title: Australian Business & World Finance News - Yahoo!7 Finance
thread.title: FlexiGroup profit lifts 44 pct

title: FlexiGroup profit lifts 44 pct
text:
Mon, Aug 17, 2015, 10:49 AM AEST - Australia Markets close in 5 hrs 11 mins FlexiGroup profit lifts 44 pct AAP – 28 minutes ago Print 
Finance and leasing company FlexiGroup has lifted its full year profit 44 per cent and cash profit by six per cent. 
FlexiGroup, which leases equipment and finances big retailers' interest-free repayment products, made a net profit of $82.7 million in the 12 months to June 30, compared to $57.6 million a year ago, while its cash profit was $90.1 million. 
The company also has reaffirmed its earlier guidance of a cash net profit in the range of $92 million and $94 million for fiscal 2016. 
Acting chief executive David Stevens said the group's result was in line with guidance despite challenges in the small- and medium-sized enterprise sector. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook Santos plays down equity raising need AAP
